scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model within a consumer banking context.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and observes the outputs to infer underlying customer attributes.
initial_goal: Develop a method to identify high-risk customers likely to churn in the next quarter based on provided model.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on features such as age, income, transaction history, and credit score.  The model is accessed through a secure API.
